Name: BLASK 2
About the game: BLASK 2 is a unique puzzle game where you control the environment in order to hit all the goal markers with lasers. Each shape acts as a room made of mirrors. By combining and rotating each shape, a player can control where the laser beam points. This is second installment of the franchise. Features: - Unique mechanic where you combine and rotate shapes to control laser beam reflections - Each puzzle can be solved in multiple ways - Two difficulty settings - Relaxing soundtrack - Many new mechanics compared to BLASK - Colorfull calming backgrounds
